GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v5.15.75
GSD.description:
misc: ocxl: fix possible refcount leak in afu_ioctl()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit 11bd8bbdf8f6f5c1145bb158793107a57e3a1f07, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 060146614643ddc5978c73ffac0329762b4651c9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: misc: ocxl: fix possible refcount leak in afu_ioctl()
